Name: Gun on the Chickahominy
About the game: Gun on the Chickahominy (GotC) is a casual pixel target game set during the American War Between the States. Players take command of a small cannon crew situated on the banks of the Chickahominy River and attempt to stem the Federal invasion of Virginia. The game offers colorful retro graphics, casual yet compelling gameplay, and reimagined period music. You alone can protect the capital against the Federals as they attempt to cross the Chickahominy River! 6 Levels Of Cannon-blasting Fun! Navigate the world map to enter new levels! 7 Unique Enemy Types! Bosses! Fight enemy bosses! Secrets! Discover secrets in the game! Small Size! Easy to run on old computers or computers without much free space! Future Updates! Future updates and expansions planned!
